message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $1,000,000. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe we can come to a more favorable agreement. Would you consider selling the product to me for $1,100,000?

Bob, while I appreciate your offer, $1,100,000 is still below my minimum threshold.  I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000 to demonstrate my interest in working with you.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let me know if you're interested.

I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,125,000. This price reflects the value of the product to me and also acknowledges your willingness to negotiate. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
